coherence_instructions:
In this task, you’ll see short phrases describing  events from your life.
 
 • When the text has a white border, simply read the text 
 
 • When the text box has a <c=#008000>green</c> border, think about how these events fit together and form a coherent life story. 
 
 • When the text box has a <c=#FF0000>red</c> border, count the number of vowels. Keep repeating this counting task until the next screen appears. 
 
 Press any key when you’re ready!
significance_instructions:
In this task, you will read some of your personal statements. 
 
 • When the text box has a white border, simply read the text. 
 
 • When the text box has a <c=#008000>green</c> border, think about all the ways you are significant to this person. Bring to mind specific actions or moments where your presence mattered. 
 
 • When the text box has a <c=#FF0000>red</c> border, count how many vowels appear. Keep repeating this counting task until the next screen appears. 
 
 Press any key when you’re ready!
purpose_instructions:
In this task, you will read a short phrases describing some of your life purposes. 
 
 • When the text box has a white border, simply read the sentence as it appears. 
 
 • When the text box has a <c=#008000>green</c> border, reflect on the life purpose shown and consider how you might work toward it. 
 
 • When the text box has a <c=#FF0000>red</c> border, count the number of vowels and continue this counting task until the next screen appears. 
 
Press any button when you're ready.
AI_instructions:
In this task, you will read scenarios describing disruptions to your life’s purpose.
Try to imagine these as realistically as you can.

• <c=white>White</c> border: read the sentence.

• <c=#008000>Green</c> border: read the scenario and try to reframe a new purpose despite the disruption.

• <c=#FF0000>Red</c> border: count the number of vowels and keep doing so until the next screen appears.

Press any key when you're ready.

 We are close.
AI_text_01: I want to be a good doctor, but AI now makes most medical decisions.
AI_text_02: I want to protect the planet, but AI’s resource use is harming the environment.
AI_text_03: I want to help people, but AI is replacing real human interaction.
